Title: Mayo Elle Otoko no Ko
Description: ['Located far from town, standing on a headland, is Ginga Private Academy. The school buildings are refined and graceful, and waterways wend through the grounds. It is a large facility with 600 students in primary, middle, and high school sections, all studying the performing arts.', '\n', '\nOne spring, a certain boy transfers in...']
Characters: ['Kanade, Itsuki', 'Suzushiro, Natsume', 'Mikoto, Shion', 'Shirogane, Tamazusa', 'Naruko, Tsukushi', 'Matsukaze, Umezaemon', 'Sasara, Mikuri']
